title: Fake News! Cong ‘Goons’ Did Not Attack A Forest Officer In AP
subtitle: Postcard News founder Mahesh Vikram Hegde on Tuesday, 21 August, tweeted a video of a man being attacked by a group of people in Andhra Pradesh, alleging that it was a cop getting trashed by Congress ‘goondas.’
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
Serial fake news propagator and Postcard News founder Mahesh Vikram Hegde on Tuesday, 21 August, tweeted a video of a man being attacked by a group of people in Andhra Pradesh, alleging that it was a cop getting trashed by Congress ‘goondas.’

He claimed that the police sub-inspector was attacked for checking the car of a Congress Member of Legislative Council (MLC). The video was retweeted over 3,000 times by 21 August evening.
